procedure.indication: FOR OPERATION: [REDACTED] is a 70 year old-year-old male who presents with pulmonary nodules. The nature, purpose, risks, benefits and alternatives to Bronchoscopy were discussed with the patient in detail. Patient indicated a wish to proceed with surgery and informed consent was signed.

The nature, purpose, risks, benefits and alternatives to Bronchoscopy were discussed with the patient in detail. Patient indicated a wish to proceed with surgery and informed consent was signed.

node_events.evidence_quote: Site 1: The 7 (subcarinal) node was < 10 mm on CT  and Metabolic activity unknown or PET-CT scan unavailable. The lymph node was photographed. The site was sampled.. 4 endobronchial ultrasound guided transbronchial biopsies were performed with samples obtained. Endobronchial ultrasound (EBUS) elastography was performed to assess lymph node stiffness and tissue characteristics. The target lymph node demonstrated a Type 1 elastographic pattern, predominantly soft (green/yellow), suggesting a reactive or benign process. Despite the benign appearance, TBNA was performed to confirm the absence of malignancy and to obtain cytology for diagnostic completeness.

Site 2: The 11Rs lymph node was < 10 mm on CT  and Metabolic activity unknown or PET-CT scan unavailable. The lymph node was photographed. The site was sampled.. 4 endobronchial ultrasound guided transbronchial biopsies were performed with samples obtained. Endobronchial ultrasound (EBUS) elastography was performed to assess lymph node stiffness and tissue characteristics. The target lymph node demonstrated a Type 2 elastographic pattern with mixed soft and stiff regions. Given this heterogeneous and indeterminate appearance, TBNA was directed at representative areas to ensure comprehensive sampling and to minimize the risk of underdiagnosis.

Site 3: The 11Ri lymph node was < 10 mm on CT  and Metabolic activity unknown or PET-CT scan unavailable. The lymph node was photographed. The site was sampled.. 5 endobronchial ultrasound guided transbronchial biopsies were performed with samples obtained. Endobronchial ultrasound (EBUS) elastography was performed to assess lymph node stiffness and tissue characteristics. The target lymph node demonstrated a Type 1 elastographic pattern, predominantly soft (green/yellow), suggesting a reactive or benign process. Despite the benign appearance, TBNA was performed to confirm the absence of malignancy and to obtain cytology for diagnostic completeness.

therapeutic_aspiration.location: Trachea (Distal 1/3), Right Mainstem, Bronchus Intermedius , Left Mainstem, Carina, RUL Carina (RC1), RML Carina (RC2), LUL Lingula Carina (Lc1), and Left Carina (LC2)

outcomes.follow_up_plan_text: [REDACTED] is a 70 year old-year-old male who presents for bronchoscopy for evaluation of pulmonary nodules. The patient underwent robot-assisted bronchoscopy and endobronchial ultrasound with transbronchial needle aspiration without immediate complication.

missing_field_prompts.label: Patient age (years)
missing_field_prompts.message: Age was not found in the note. Add age in years (e.g., 65-year-old).

missing_field_prompts.label: ASA class
missing_field_prompts.message: ASA class was not found in the note. Add ASA 16 (e.g., ASA 3).

missing_field_prompts.label: ECOG/Zubrod performance status
missing_field_prompts.message: ECOG/Zubrod performance status was not found in the note. Add ECOG 04 (or a range like 01).

missing_field_prompts.label: CT characteristics
missing_field_prompts.message: CT characteristics were not captured. Add solid/part-solid/ground-glass/cavitary/calcified when documented.

missing_field_prompts.label: Distance from pleura (mm)
missing_field_prompts.message: Distance from pleura was not captured. Add distance (mm/cm) or state abutting pleura.

missing_field_prompts.label: PET SUV max
missing_field_prompts.message: SUV max was not captured. Add SUV (e.g., SUV max 4.2) when documented.

missing_field_prompts.label: CT bronchus sign
missing_field_prompts.message: CT bronchus sign was not captured. Document positive/negative when explicitly stated.

missing_field_prompts.label: Registration error (mm)
missing_field_prompts.message: Registration error was not captured. Document registration error (mm) if stated.

missing_field_prompts.label: Tool-in-lesion confirmation
missing_field_prompts.message: Tool-in-lesion confirmation was not captured. Document whether tool-in-lesion was confirmed.

missing_field_prompts.label: CT-to-body divergence (mm)
missing_field_prompts.message: CT-to-body divergence/registration mismatch was not captured. Document divergence (mm) when stated.

missing_field_prompts.label: Passes (per station)
missing_field_prompts.message: Passes per station were not captured. Document number of passes per station when stated.

missing_field_prompts.label: Node size short axis (mm)
missing_field_prompts.message: Short-axis node size was not captured. Document node measurements when stated.

missing_field_prompts.label: Adequacy: lymphocytes present
missing_field_prompts.message: Station adequacy (lymphocytes present) was not captured. Document ROSE/pathology adequacy when stated.
